name: Life Space Probiotic For Baby 60g Powder
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Scientifically formulated with 10 different strains of premium quality beneficial bacteria, Life-Space probiotics encourage good bacterial diversity to support optimal health and wellbeing for developing infants.  Health benefits may include:

Supporting the development of a healthy immune system
Reducing the risk of developing eczema, as well as the occurrence of eczema, in the first 2 years of life.
Assisting with the digestion and absorption of nutrients
Helping to restore beneficial bacteria that may have been disrupted by Antibiotics
Supporting normal, healthy bowel movements
No added dairy, lactose, gluten, yeast, egg, fructose, flavours, colours, artificial sweeteners or preservatives
Life-Space is an Australian owned company
Life-Space products are manufactured in Australia
Live Bacteria Guaranteed
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Always read the label. Use only as directed. If symptoms persist see your healthcare professional.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      
    
    
      Directions
      
    
    
      Indications

name: Life Space 100 Billion Probiotic 30g Powder
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Medicated Probiotic. 
Manufactured in Australia. 
Clinical strength powder blend. Scientifically formulated with 15 different strains of premium quality beneficial bacteria, Life-Space probiotics encourage good bacterial diversity to support optimal health and wellbeing. 
Health benefits may include:  

Symptomatic relief of medically diagnosed Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
Supporting intestinal barrier function
Supporting normal, healthy bowel movements
Supporting a healthy immune system
No added dairy, gluten, yeast, egg, fructose or preservative
Life-Space is an Australian owned company
Life-Space products are manufactured in Australia
Live Bacteria Guaranteed
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Always read the label. Use only as directed. If symptoms persist see your healthcare professional.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      
    
    
      Directions
      Adults take 1-2 grams daily or as directed by your healthcare professional. 1 gram dosage spoon included. Add to water or food immediately prior to consumption.
    
    
      Indications

name: Life Space Probiotic For 60+ Years 60 Capsules
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Scientifically formulated with 15 different strains of premium quality beneficial bacteria, Life-Space probiotics encourage good bacterial diversity to support optimal health and wellbeing.  The formula is high in levels of Bifidobacterium, a beneficial bacteria that may decline naturally over the age of 60 years. 
Health benefits may include:

Supporting the health and function of the digestive tract
Helping to restore beneficial bacteria that may have been disrupted by antibiotics
Supporting normal, healthy bowel movements
Supporting a healthy immune system
No added dairy, gluten, yeast, egg, fructose or preservative
Life-Space is an Australian owned company
Life-Space products are manufactured in Australia
Live Bacteria Guaranteed
